metadata.title: CVE-2021-47064 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mt76:fix potential DMA mapping leak With buf uninitialized inmt76_dma_tx_queue_skb_raw, its field skip_unmap could potentially inherit anon-zero value from stack garbage. If this happens, it will cause DMAmappings for MCU command frames to not be unmapped after completion

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
